constituent: specimen, metal, gold, oversee, retainer, slave, reclining, lying down, one, floor, dish
koohiiStory1: The overseer tags his slaves with gold earrings, just like specimens.
koohiiStory2: (Thanks bodhisamaya) The authorities are suspicious about the athlete that won GOLD at the olympics. They are now OVERSEEING a thorough drug test, taking all sorts of SPECIMENS.
words:
印鑑(いんかん): stamp, seal
年鑑(ねんかん): yearbook
鑑賞(かんしょう): appreciation
図鑑(ずかん): picture book
